body: whoever impregnates Loli will be punished

Story in short : 
After Hinano's father died from illness. Her mother becomes paranoid with health. In that time, she even believes too much with charm, healing stone, essential oil, "Miracle Therapy" from any occult or sect including this shrewd sect. Well, she is totally docile getting raeped and when she is pregnant, her mother is just happy that she bears miraculous child. Hinano only silent because she only wants her mother happy. In the end the sect is captured by police for doing crime
the loli getting pregnant killed it for me :/, also isn't she too young to get pregnant?
